## Blocks

Collapsable callout block 
: ```md
::: {.callout-warning collapse=true appearance="simple"}  
### Title 
:::
```

Panels
: ```md
::: {.panel-tabset}
### Panel heading 1
### Panel heading 2
:::
```

## Formatting

Font-color
: ```html
<font color="grey">
</font>
```

## Keyboard shortcuts

Format keyboard keys for different operating systems
: 

```html
    {{< kbd mac=Shift-Command-O win=Shift-Control-O linux=Shift-Ctrl-L >}}
```

simple
: 

```html
    {{< kbd Shift-Ctrl-P >}}
```

Format arrow keys
: 

```html
    {{<kbd &uarr; >}}
    {{<kbd &darr; >}}
    {{<kbd &larr; >}}
    {{<kbd &rarr; >}}
```
